name: Mahjongg Danmensions
description:
Mahjongg Danmensions

A Mahjongg-Inspired 3D Puzzler game made in one week in Unity.

Original game can be found here: https://www.arkadium.com/games/mahjongg-dimensions/. This game has no intention of copyright infringement whatsoever.

How To Play
  • Game has a 4x4x4 cube grid that supports 6 different cube tiles. All cubes have a distinctive tile representing its type in all 6 faces.
  • The game has a 5 minute timer, decreasing count in seconds. Player loses if timer reaches zero.
  • Player can click on two cube tiles with the same sprite.
  • Player can click and drag to rotate the cube grid horizontally (not vertically).
  • Cube tiles can only be pressed if they have mostly one neighbor in each horizontal direction (up and down cubes don’t interfere).
  • Every time the player removes two tiles successfully, they receive 100 points.
  • Player wins if they manage to clear all cubes in the following time.
Source Code

The source code is completely public and can be found here: https://github.com/Dans1997/Mahjongg-Dimensions. If you are a programmer and have any feedback, just send me a message.
